alert.note: Alert for Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 4:42PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Hidalgo County through 530 PM CDT... At 442 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cornerstone Regional Medical Center, or over North McAllen, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Edinburg, Mission, Pharr, San Juan, Alamo, Palmhurst, North McAllen, Sharyland, South McAllen, and Alton. This includes the following highways... Interstate Highway 69 C between mile markers 1 and 9. US Highway 281 between mile markers 784 and 786. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
